author: JanFSchulte
body: Changes the StoN cut in the hit selection for SiPix Alignment of pixel large structures in PCL form 18 to 12 to conform with default value used in Alignment group. Also adds configs for running this alignment at 0T, in case this is needed at some point. Same as PR #14345 https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/14345 for 8_1_X
title: Change of StoN cut in hit selection for SiPixAli in PCL + 0T configs for the same
